abstract: Three years after the British government rescued Royal Bank of Scotland, the Lloyds Banking Group and Northern Rock, DealBook tracks down some former top executives.
snippet: Three years after the British government rescued Royal Bank of Scotland, the Lloyds Banking Group and Northern Rock, DealBook tracks down some former top executives.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- It has been three years since the British government bailed out Royal Bank of Scotland and the Lloyds Banking Group and nationalized the regional lender Northern Rock.

headline.main: For British Ex-Bankers, Life Beyond the Bailouts
